data.title: Halsey Dermatology
data.text:
Dr. Mark Halsey, MD is an expert at identifying and treating skin disease. He works hand-in-hand with primary care providers and specialists to assist in the most complex of cases.

He has expertise in diagnosing and treating:

Acne

Skin cancer

Rashes

Sun damage

Moles (nevi)

Dermatitis

Psoriasis

Eczema

Dry skin (xerosis)

Freckling and dyspigmentation

Birthmarks

Hair loss (alopecia)

among many others

He performs skin biopsies to assist in diagnosis when medically necessary, and regularly discusses cases with dermatopathologists to determine the best course of management as needed for his patients.

Dr. Halsey is a skilled surgeon and procedural dermatologist, able to customize treatment plans for patients needing intervention for skin cancers and other growths. He is able to offer the latest treatments including PRP (platelet rich plasma) for male and female pattern hair loss, having been trained to use same RegenLabs technology innovated by his world-renowed colleagues at the Ronald O. Perelman Department of Dermatology at NYU.
